cameljamod.impl
Class JamodUriResolver

java.lang.Object
  cameljamod.impl.JamodUriResolver

public class JamodUriResolver
extends Object

Utility class for parsing camel-jamod URIs. URI syntax: protocol://host[:port]/dataType/reference[?options]

Author:
Steven Swor
